org.apache.pulsar.broker.cache

Class ResourceQuotaCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pulsar.broker.cache.ResourceQuotaCache

  • public class ResourceQuotaCache
extends Object
    Cache service and ZooKeeper read/write access for resource quota.
